Texts.Eng:
An unusually evolved carnivorous humanoid with reptilian aspects melded into their forms.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Exceptional aerial agility. -^green;39^reset;% Fall Speed
  +^green;18^reset;% Speed, +^green;20^reset;% Jump, Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;.
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Fire, +^green;20^reset;% Physical
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Burning, Heat.

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  On Hot Biomes, Health x^green;1.15^reset; and Speed
  On Cold Biomes, Health x^red;0.75^reset;, -^red;10^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Hammer/Mace: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Wand/Staff: Damage x^green;1.12^reset;
  Dagger: +^green;20%^reset; Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.8^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Poison, Ice
